script:
1). Wouldn't you rather telecommute?
I will not like to.
No, I like working in an office. 
I'd not rather.
2). Did you remember to bring your passport?
Yeah, I didn't.
Yes, I've got it right here. 
I forgot to brang it.
3). Are we still on for Tuesday?
We sure are. At three. 
I'm off on Monday.
No, we weren't.
